subject: Wrestling
Books and Literature
lead_paragraph: Before Ken Kesey wrote “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” or stocked a psychedelic school bus with LSD and the Merry Pranksters to look for America, he was a wrestler at the University of Oregon.
snippet: Before Ken Kesey wrote “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” or stocked a psychedelic school bus with LSD and the Merry Pranksters to look for America, he was a wrestler at the University of Oregon.
